phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˌnɑːt ət ˈɔːl/，'not at' 连读成 /ˈnɑːtət/，t 音失爆，'at all' 连读成 /ətˈɔːl/

examples.title: 回应感谢
examples.desc: 别人道谢时的礼貌回应
examples.english: Thank you so much! - Not at all.

examples.title: 否定回答
examples.english: Are you tired? - Not at all, I feel great!
examples.chinese: 你累吗？- 一点也不累，我感觉很好！

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /əˈlɑːtəv/，'a' 弱读成 /ə/，'lot of' 连读，t 音失爆或变成闪音

examples.title: 描述数量
examples.english: I have a lot of work to do today.
examples.chinese: 我今天有很多工作要做。
examples.usage: 口语中最常用的表达大量的方式

examples.title: 表达程度
examples.english: She has a lot of experience in teaching.
examples.chinese: 她在教学方面有很多经验。
examples.usage: 可修饰可数和不可数名词

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈkaɪndə/ 或口语中常说成 /ˈkɪndə/，'of' 弱读成 /ə/，d 音几乎消失

examples.title: 表达不确定
examples.english: I'm kind of tired. Maybe I should rest.
examples.chinese: 我有点累了，也许我该休息一下。
examples.usage: 比直接说更委婉、口语化

examples.title: 模糊表达
examples.english: It's kind of expensive, don't you think?

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈsɔːrtəv/，'of' 弱读成 /əv/ 或 /ə/，t 音失爆

examples.title: 不太确定
examples.english: I'm sort of hungry. Should we eat?
examples.chinese: 我有点饿了，我们要吃东西吗？

examples.title: 委婉说法
examples.english: He's sort of my boss, but not really.
examples.chinese: 他算是我的老板，但又不完全是。
examples.usage: 表达复杂或模糊的关系

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈaʊtəv/，'of' 弱读成 /əv/ 或 /ə/，t 音失爆或消失

examples.title: 表示缺少
examples.english: We're out of milk. Can you buy some?
examples.chinese: 我们没牛奶了，你能买一些吗？

examples.title: 表示离开
examples.english: He walked out of the room quickly.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈwɑːnə/ 或 /ˈwʌnə/，'to' 弱读成 /tə/，t 音常变成闪音，口语中常说成 'wanna'

examples.title: 表达意愿
examples.english: I want to go home now.
examples.usage: 最常用的表达愿望的方式

examples.title: 询问意愿
examples.english: Do you want to grab some coffee?

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə/，'to' 弱读，口语中常说成 /ˈɡʌnə/ 'gonna'

examples.title: 表达计划
examples.english: I'm going to visit my parents this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我这周末打算去看望父母。
examples.usage: 表示将来的计划或意图

examples.title: 预测未来
examples.english: It's going to rain soon. Take an umbrella.
examples.chinese: 马上要下雨了，带把伞吧。

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈhæftə/ 或 /ˈhæftʊ/，'to' 弱读，v 音常失爆变成 f 音，口语中常说成 'hafta'

examples.title: 表达义务
examples.english: I have to finish this report by tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我必须在明天之前完成这份报告。
examples.usage: 表示外部要求或必要性

examples.title: 表达不得不
examples.english: I have to work late tonight.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈɡɑːtə/ 或 /ˈɡɑːtʊ/，'to' 弱读，t 音失爆，口语中常说成 'gotta'

examples.title: 表达急迫
examples.english: I've got to go now. See you later!

examples.title: 强调必要
examples.english: You've got to try this cake. It's amazing!
examples.chinese: 你一定要尝尝这个蛋糕，太好吃了！

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈjuːstə/ 或 /ˈjuːstʊ/，'to' 弱读，d 音失爆或变成 s 音

examples.title: 回忆过去
examples.english: I used to play basketball every day.
examples.usage: 表示过去的习惯，现在不再做

examples.title: 对比现在
examples.english: This used to be a quiet neighborhood.
examples.chinese: 这里过去是个安静的社区。

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈletmi/，t 音和 m 音连读，t 音几乎消失

examples.title: 主动帮忙
examples.english: Let me help you with that bag.

examples.title: 请求机会
examples.english: Let me think about it for a moment.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈɡɪvmi/ 或 /ˈɡɪmmi/，v 音和 m 音连读，口语中常说成 'gimme'

examples.title: 请求物品
examples.english: Can you give me that pen?

examples.title: 请求时间
examples.english: Give me five minutes to get ready.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈtelmi/，ll 音和 m 音连读，l 音弱化

examples.title: 询问信息
examples.english: Tell me what happened yesterday.
examples.chinese: 告诉我昨天发生了什么。

examples.title: 征求意见
examples.english: Tell me what you think about this idea.
examples.chinese: 告诉我你对这个想法的看法。

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈæskɪm/，'him' 的 h 音失去，k 音和 i 音连读

examples.title: 建议询问
examples.english: I don't know. You should ask him.

examples.title: 转移询问
examples.english: Ask him if he wants to join us.
examples.chinese: 问问他是否想加入我们。

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈkɔːlər/，'her' 的 h 音失去，ll 音和 er 音连读

examples.title: 建议联系
examples.english: You should call her right now.
examples.chinese: 你应该现在就给她打电话。

examples.title: 请求行动
examples.english: Can you call her and ask about the meeting?
examples.chinese: 你能给她打电话问问会议的事吗？

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈpɪkɪtʌp/，'it' 的 t 音失爆，'it up' 连读

examples.title: 捡起物品
examples.english: You dropped your keys. Pick them up!

examples.title: 接听电话
examples.english: The phone is ringing. Can you pick it up?
examples.chinese: 电话响了，你能接一下吗？

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈtɜːrnɪtɔːf/，'it' 的 t 音失爆，'it off' 连读

examples.title: 关闭设备
examples.english: The TV is too loud. Turn it off, please.

examples.title: 节约能源
examples.english: Don't forget to turn off the lights when you leave.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈpʊtɪtɑːn/，'it' 的 t 音失爆，'it on' 连读

examples.title: 穿戴衣物
examples.english: It's cold outside. Put on your jacket.
examples.chinese: 外面很冷，穿上你的夹克。

examples.title: 播放音乐
examples.english: I love this song! Put it on!

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈtʃekɪtaʊt/，'it' 的 t 音失爆，'it out' 连读

examples.title: 推荐查看
examples.english: There's a new restaurant downtown. Let's check it out!
examples.chinese: 市中心有家新餐厅，我们去看看吧！

examples.title: 展示成果
examples.english: I just finished my project. Check it out!
examples.chinese: 我刚完成我的项目，看看吧！

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈfɪɡərɪtaʊt/，'it' 的 t 音失爆，'it out' 连读，r 音和 i 音连读

examples.title: 解决问题
examples.english: This is complicated, but I'll figure it out.
examples.chinese: 这很复杂，但我会弄明白的。

examples.title: 理解事物
examples.english: I don't understand this yet, but I'm trying to figure it out.
examples.chinese: 我还不明白这个，但我正在努力弄清楚。

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /əzˈsuːnəz/，两个 'as' 都弱读成 /əz/，'soon as' 连读

examples.title: 表示时间
examples.english: Call me as soon as you arrive.

examples.title: 承诺行动
examples.english: I'll let you know as soon as I hear anything.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ˈɡetaʊtəv/，'out of' 连读，t 音失爆

examples.title: 离开地点
examples.english: Get out of my room!

examples.title: 摆脱困境
examples.english: You can't get out of doing your homework.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ɪnˈfrʌntəv/，'of' 弱读成 /əv/，'front of' 连读

examples.title: 描述位置
examples.english: There's a car in front of the house.

examples.title: 当众行为
examples.english: Don't say that in front of the kids!
examples.chinese: 别在孩子们面前说那个！

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /bɪˈkɑːzəv/ 或 /bɪˈkʌzəv/，'of' 弱读成 /əv/

examples.title: 解释原因
examples.english: The game was cancelled because of the rain.

examples.title: 归因结果
examples.english: I'm late because of the traffic.

phrases.pronunciationTips: 连读为 /ɪnˈstedəv/，'of' 弱读成 /əv/，d 音和 of 连读

examples.title: 提出替代
examples.english: Let's walk instead of taking the bus.
examples.chinese: 我们走路吧，不要坐公交。

examples.title: 对比选择
examples.english: He stayed home instead of going to the party.
examples.chinese: 他待在家里而不是去参加聚会。

examples.title: 日常使用
examples.english: This is a common phrase.

examples.title: 对话场景
examples.english: Let me show you an example.

examples.english: This is a common phrase.

examples.english: Let me show you an example.

examples.english: This is a common phrase.

examples.title: 对话场景
examples.english: Let me show you an example.

examples.title: 日常使用
examples.english: This is a common phrase.

examples.title: 对话场景
examples.english: Let me show you an example.

examples.title: 思考
examples.english: Let me see... I think it's in the drawer.
examples.chinese: 让我想想...我觉得在抽屉里。

examples.title: 查看
examples.english: Let me see what I can do to help.
examples.chinese: 让我看看我能帮什么忙。

examples.title: 请求
examples.english: Give me a minute, I'll be right there.
examples.chinese: 给我一分钟，我马上就来。

examples.title: 要求
examples.english: Can you give me a hand with this?

examples.title: 明白了
examples.english: Oh, I got you now. That makes sense.

examples.title: 抓到了
examples.english: Got you! I knew you were hiding there.
examples.chinese: 抓到你了！我就知道你藏在那。

examples.title: 打赌
examples.english: I bet you can't finish that in one minute!
examples.chinese: 我打赌你一分钟内完成不了！

examples.title: 肯定
examples.english: I bet you're tired after that long day.
examples.chinese: 我敢肯定你累了，这么长的一天。

examples.title: 见面
examples.english: Nice to meet you! I've heard a lot about you.
examples.chinese: 很高兴见到你！我听说过很多关于你的事。

examples.title: 约定
examples.english: I'll meet you at the cafe at 3 PM.
examples.chinese: 我下午3点在咖啡馆见你。

examples.title: 早说了
examples.english: I told you it would rain today!
examples.chinese: 我告诉过你今天会下雨！

examples.title: 强调
examples.english: See? I told you he would come.
examples.chinese: 看吧？我告诉过你他会来的。

examples.title: 必要性
examples.english: I need to finish this report by Friday.
examples.chinese: 我需要在周五前完成这份报告。

examples.title: 建议
examples.english: You need to see a doctor about that cough.
examples.chinese: 你需要看医生检查一下那个咳嗽。

examples.title: 应该
examples.english: You're supposed to be at work right now!

examples.title: 预期
examples.english: It's supposed to be sunny tomorrow.

examples.title: 努力
examples.english: I'm trying to learn Spanish this year.
examples.chinese: 我今年在努力学西班牙语。

examples.title: 尝试
examples.english: What are you trying to do?

examples.title: 发生
examples.english: What's going on here? Why is everyone shouting?
examples.chinese: 这里发生什么了？为什么大家都在喊？

examples.title: 进行
examples.english: There's a lot going on at work right now.
examples.chinese: 现在工作上有很多事情在进行。

examples.title: 召唤
examples.english: Come here, I want to show you something.
examples.chinese: 过来，我想给你看点东西。

examples.title: 命令
examples.english: Come here right now!

examples.title: 离开
examples.english: Get out of here! I need some privacy.

examples.title: 逃离
examples.english: We need to get out before it's too late.
examples.chinese: 我们需要在太晚之前出去。

examples.title: 关闭
examples.english: Don't forget to shut down your computer before leaving.
examples.chinese: 离开前别忘了关闭电脑。

examples.title: 停业
examples.english: The factory will shut down next month.

examples.title: 坐下
examples.english: Please sit down and make yourself comfortable.

examples.title: 命令
examples.english: Sit down and listen to me!

examples.title: 起立
examples.english: Stand up when the teacher enters the room.

examples.title: 站立
examples.english: Can you stand up for a second? I need to get past.
examples.chinese: 你能站起来一下吗？我需要过去。

examples.title: 寻找
examples.english: I'm looking for my keys. Have you seen them?
examples.chinese: 我在找我的钥匙。你看到了吗？

examples.title: 找工作
examples.english: She's looking for a new job.

examples.title: 照顾
examples.english: Can you look after my dog while I'm away?
examples.chinese: 我不在的时候你能照顾我的狗吗？

examples.title: 照料
examples.english: He looks after his elderly parents.

examples.title: 调查
examples.english: We'll look into the problem and get back to you.
examples.chinese: 我们会调查这个问题并回复你。

examples.title: 研究
examples.english: I'm looking into different investment options.
examples.chinese: 我在研究不同的投资选择。

examples.title: 保重
examples.english: Take care! See you next week.

examples.title: 小心
examples.english: Take care when crossing the street.

examples.title: 确保
examples.english: Make sure you lock the door before you leave.

examples.title: 务必
examples.english: Make sure you're on time for the interview.

examples.title: 发现
examples.english: I just found out that he's moving to another city.
examples.chinese: 我刚发现他要搬到另一个城市。

examples.title: 查明
examples.english: Let's find out what really happened.
examples.chinese: 让我们查明到底发生了什么。

examples.title: 锻炼
examples.english: I work out at the gym three times a week.
examples.chinese: 我每周在健身房锻炼三次。

examples.title: 解决
examples.english: Don't worry, everything will work out fine.
examples.chinese: 别担心，一切都会好起来的。

examples.title: 闲逛
examples.english: Do you want to hang out this weekend?
examples.chinese: 这周末你想一起出去玩吗？

examples.title: 消磨时间
examples.english: We just hung out at the mall all afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我们整个下午就在商场闲逛。

examples.title: 回来
examples.english: When will you come back from your trip?
examples.chinese: 你什么时候从旅行回来？

examples.title: 再来
examples.english: Come back anytime! You're always welcome.

examples.title: 回去
examples.english: I need to go back home to get my wallet.

examples.title: 追溯
examples.english: Let's go back to what we were discussing earlier.
examples.chinese: 让我们回到之前讨论的内容。

examples.title: 回来
examples.english: What time did you get back last night?

examples.title: 恢复
examples.english: I need to get back to work now.
examples.chinese: 我现在需要回去工作了。

examples.title: 带回
examples.english: Can you bring back some milk from the store?
examples.chinese: 你能从商店带些牛奶回来吗？

examples.title: 使回忆
examples.english: This song brings back so many memories.
examples.chinese: 这首歌唤起了很多回忆。

examples.title: 拿走
examples.english: Please take away these dirty dishes.

examples.title: 外卖
examples.english: Is this for here or take away?
examples.chinese: 这是在这吃还是打包带走？

examples.title: 扔掉
examples.english: Don't throw away those boxes. I need them.
examples.chinese: 别扔掉那些盒子，我需要它们。

examples.title: 浪费
examples.english: Don't throw away this opportunity!

examples.title: 收起来
examples.english: Put away your toys before dinner.
examples.chinese: 晚饭前把你的玩具收起来。

examples.title: 存起来
examples.english: I try to put away some money each month.
examples.chinese: 我试着每个月存一些钱。

examples.title: 一直
examples.english: He complains all the time. It's so annoying!
examples.chinese: 他一直在抱怨，太烦人了！

examples.title: 经常
examples.english: This happens all the time. Don't worry.
examples.chinese: 这种事经常发生，别担心。

examples.title: 同时
examples.english: We arrived at the same time.

examples.title: 然而
examples.english: I like the idea, but at the same time, I'm worried.
examples.chinese: 我喜欢这个想法，但同时我也担心。

examples.title: 一会儿
examples.english: Let's rest for a while before continuing.
examples.chinese: 让我们休息一会儿再继续。

examples.title: 一段时间
examples.english: I haven't seen him for a while.
examples.chinese: 我有一段时间没见到他了。

examples.title: 马上
examples.english: I'll be there in a minute!

examples.title: 稍等
examples.english: Hold on, I'll be with you in a minute.

examples.title: 偶尔
examples.english: I eat fast food once in a while, but not often.
examples.chinese: 我偶尔吃快餐，但不常吃。

examples.title: 有时
examples.english: It's good to treat yourself once in a while.

examples.title: 迟早
examples.english: He'll find out the truth sooner or later.

examples.title: 早晚
examples.english: Sooner or later, you'll have to face this problem.
examples.chinese: 你早晚得面对这个问题。

examples.title: 反复
examples.english: I've told you over and over not to do that!
examples.chinese: 我反复告诉过你别那样做！

examples.title: 重复
examples.english: She practiced the song over and over until perfect.
examples.chinese: 她反复练习这首歌直到完美。

examples.title: 偶尔
examples.english: I still see my old friends now and then.
examples.chinese: 我偶尔还会见到老朋友。

examples.title: 有时
examples.english: Now and then, I think about moving abroad.

examples.title: 一天天
examples.english: She's getting better day by day.

examples.title: 每天
examples.english: Day by day, we're making progress.

examples.title: 一步步
examples.english: Let's solve this problem step by step.
examples.chinese: 让我们一步步解决这个问题。

examples.title: 逐步
examples.english: You'll learn it step by step. Don't rush.
examples.chinese: 你会一步步学会的，别着急。

examples.title: 在...上面
examples.english: Put the book on top of the desk.

examples.title: 除...之外
examples.english: On top of my regular work, I have this project.
examples.chinese: 除了日常工作，我还有这个项目。

examples.title: 在...结束时
examples.english: We'll have a party at the end of the month.

examples.title: 在...尽头
examples.english: The bathroom is at the end of the hallway.

examples.title: 在...中间
examples.english: There's a fountain in the middle of the square.

examples.title: 正在...时
examples.english: Don't call me in the middle of a meeting!
examples.chinese: 别在我开会时给我打电话！

examples.title: 在路上
examples.english: I'm on the way. I'll be there in 10 minutes.

examples.title: 顺路
examples.english: Can you buy some milk on the way home?
examples.chinese: 你回家路上能买些牛奶吗？

examples.title: 顺便说一下
examples.english: By the way, did you hear about the party?
examples.chinese: 顺便说一下，你听说聚会的事了吗？

examples.title: 对了
examples.english: By the way, I found your keys.
examples.chinese: 对了，我找到你的钥匙了。

examples.title: 最后
examples.english: In the end, we decided to stay home.
examples.chinese: 最后，我们决定待在家里。

examples.title: 终于
examples.english: In the end, everything worked out fine.

examples.title: 此刻
examples.english: I'm busy at the moment. Can I call you back?
examples.chinese: 我现在很忙，我能回电给你吗？

examples.title: 目前
examples.english: At the moment, we don't have any openings.
examples.chinese: 目前我们没有空缺职位。

examples.title: 第一次
examples.english: I'm visiting Paris for the first time.

examples.title: 首次
examples.english: For the first time, I feel truly happy.
examples.chinese: 我第一次感到真正快乐。

examples.title: 就...而言
examples.english: In terms of price, this is the best option.
examples.chinese: 就价格而言，这是最好的选择。

examples.title: 在...方面
examples.english: What do you think in terms of quality?

examples.title: 万一
examples.english: In case of emergency, call this number.
examples.chinese: 万一紧急情况，打这个号码。

examples.title: 以防
examples.english: Take an umbrella in case of rain.

examples.title: 尽管
examples.english: In spite of the rain, we went hiking.
examples.chinese: 尽管下雨，我们还是去徒步了。

examples.title: 不顾
examples.english: He succeeded in spite of many difficulties.
examples.chinese: 他不顾许多困难取得了成功。

examples.title: 代表
examples.english: I'm calling on behalf of my boss.
examples.chinese: 我代表我的老板打电话。

examples.title: 以...名义
examples.english: On behalf of everyone, thank you!

examples.title: 通过
examples.english: We communicate by means of email.
examples.chinese: 我们通过电子邮件沟通。

examples.title: 用
examples.english: The problem was solved by means of negotiation.

examples.title: 支持
examples.english: I'm in favor of the new policy.

examples.title: 有利于
examples.english: The decision was in favor of the workers.

examples.title: 在...之前
examples.english: We finished ahead of schedule.

examples.title: 领先于
examples.english: Our team is ahead of the competition.
examples.chinese: 我们的团队领先于竞争对手。
